import React from "react"; import { Card , CardBody ,CardTitle , CardSubtitle ,CardText,CardFooter,Button,Container } from "reactstrap"; import prop1 from "../assets/properties/1/1d4f0757fdb86d5f.jpg"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate,Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Pglist =(props) => { const{pglist} =props const [pid, setpid] = useState(''); const navigate=useNavigate() const handleButtonClick = (data) => { console.log('id', data); navigate("/PropertyDetail",{ state :{ pid: data}}) }; //average of rating var avgRate = parseInt((pglist.ratingClean+ pglist.ratingFood + pglist.ratingSafety )/3); return (
{avgRate === 5 ? <> : <> } {avgRate === 4 ? <> : <> } {avgRate === 3 ? <> : <> } {avgRate === 2 ? <> : <> } {avgRate === 1 ? : <> }

) } export default Pglist;
